data.name: Sample - Cyble Vision - 2.0.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Cyble Vision" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Get Advisory Details
workflows.description: Retrieves specific advisory details from Cyble Vision based on the advisory ID you have specified.

workflows.name: File Hash / Domain / IP / URL > Cyble Vision Threat Intelligence > Enrichment
workflows.description: Retrieve the reputation of indicator of type ‘File Hash / Domain / IP / URL’ using Cyble Vision Threat Intelligence.

steps.name: Compute Cyble Vision Threat Intelligence Summary

params.value:
Cyble Vision Threat Intelligence Detection Summary
Confidence Risk Score Is Whitelisted
{% if vars.steps.Get_Reputation.data.data.iocs[0]['confidence_rating'] == vars.malicious_score %}
{{vars.steps.Get_Reputation.data.data.iocs[0]['confidence_rating']}}
{% elif vars.steps.Get_Reputation.data.data.iocs[0]['confidence_rating'] == vars.suspicious_score %}
{{vars.steps.Get_Reputation.data.data.iocs[0]['confidence_rating']}}
{% elif vars.steps.Get_Reputation.data.data.iocs[0]['confidence_rating'] == vars.good_score %}
{{vars.steps.Get_Reputation.data.data.iocs[0]['confidence_rating']}}
{% else %}
{{vars.steps.Get_Reputation.data.data.iocs[0]['confidence_rating']}}
{% endif %}
{{vars.steps.Get_Reputation.data.data.iocs[0]['risk_score']}}
{{vars.steps.Get_Reputation.data.data.iocs[0]['is_whitelisted']}}

conditions.step_name: Compute Cyble Vision Threat Intelligence Summary

arguments.verdict: {% if vars.steps.Get_Reputation.data.data.iocs[0]['risk_score'] >= 50 %}{{"Malicious"}}{% elif vars.steps.Get_Reputation.data.data.iocs[0]['risk_score'] < 50 and vars.steps.Get_Reputation.data.data.iocs[0]['risk_score'] >= 20  %}{{"Suspicious"}}{% elif vars.steps.Get_Reputation.data.data.iocs[0]['risk_score'].risk_score < 20 %}{{"Good"}}{% else %}{{"No Reputation Available"}}{% endif %}

routes.name: Compute Cyble Vision Threat Intelligence Summary -> Copy of Return Output Data
Is IOC Found -> Compute Fortinet FortiGuard Threat Intelligence Summary
routes.label: Found

workflows.name: Fetch Indicators
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of indicators from Cyble Vision based on the input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: Fetch CVE Details
workflows.description: Retrieve the specific common vulnerability and exposure (CVE) details from Cyble Vision.

workflows.name: Fetch Alerts
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of alerts from Cyble Vision based on the company ID, and other parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: > Cyble Vision  > Fetch and Create
workflows.description: Fetch and Create Indicators from Cyble Vision

arguments.reputation_map: {'Good': {{'IndicatorReputation'| picklist('Good') }}, 'Malicious': {{'IndicatorReputation'| picklist('Malicious') }}, 'Suspicious': {{'IndicatorReputation'| picklist('Suspicious') }}, 'TBD': {{'IndicatorReputation'| picklist('TBD') }}, 'No Reputation Available': {{'IndicatorReputation'| picklist('No Reputation Available') }}}
arguments.indicator_type_map: {'domain-name': {{'ThreatIntelFeedType'| picklist('Domain') }}, 'domain': {{'ThreatIntelFeedType'| picklist('Domain') }}, 'file:hashes': {{'ThreatIntelFeedType'| picklist('FileHash') }}, 'MD5': {{'ThreatIntelFeedType'| picklist('FileHash-MD5') }}, 'SHA-1': {{'ThreatIntelFeedType'| picklist('FileHash-SHA1') }}, 'SHA-256': {{'ThreatIntelFeedType'| picklist('FileHash-SHA256') }}, 'ipv4-addr': {{'ThreatIntelFeedType'| picklist('IPv4 Address') }}, 'ipv6-addr': {{'ThreatIntelFeedType'| picklist('IPv6 Address') }}, 'url': {{'ThreatIntelFeedType'| picklist('URL') }}, 'windows-registry-key': {{'ThreatIntelFeedType'| picklist('Registry') }} }

resource.reputation: {% if vars.item.risk_score|int >60 %}{{"IndicatorReputation" | picklist("Malicious", "@id")}}{% elif vars.item.risk_score|int >= 20 and vars.item.risk_score|int <=60  %}{{"IndicatorReputation" | picklist("Suspicious", "@id")}}{% elif vars.item.risk_score|int < 20  %}{{"IndicatorReputation" | picklist("Good", "@id")}}{% else %}{{"IndicatorReputation" | picklist("No Reputation Available", "@id")}}{% endif %}

step_variables._configuration_schema:
[
  {
    "title": "Confidence",
    "name": "confidence",
    "type": "integer",
    "tooltip": "Default Confidence score to be set for the feeds",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "value": 90,
    "validation": {
       "minlength": 0,
       "maxlength": 100
    }
  },
  {
    "title": "Reputation",
    "name": "reputation",
    "type": "select",
    "tooltip": "Default Reputation to be set for the feeds",
    "required": true,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "options": ["Good", "Suspicious", "Malicious", "No Reputation Available", "TBD"],
    "value": "Good"
  },
  {
    "title": "TLP",
    "name": "tlp",
    "type": "select",
    "tooltip": "Default TLP to be set for the feeds",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "options": ["Red", "Amber", "Green", "White"],
    "value": "White"
  },
  {
    "title": "Maximum Age (in days)",
    "name": "expiry",
    "type": "integer",
    "tooltip": "Default age for the feeds. The indicator expires on 'valid_until' date unless a different expiry is specified here. If specified, the indicator will be marked expired on valid_from + expiry.",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true
  },
  {
    "title": "Pull Sample Indicators in Past X Minutes",
    "name": "Pull_Sample_Incident_in_Past_X_Minutes",
    "type": "text",
    "tooltip": "Pull the indicators in the past X minutes. e.g. 1440 minutes are 1 day.",
    "required": true,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "value": 1440
  }
]

routes.name: Create Feed List -> Create Record old
Get Macro Value -> Set Time Configuration
Is data only for mapping -> Return Sample Data
routes.label: Yes, For Mapping

routes.name: Is data only for mapping -> tttt
routes.label: No, For Ingestion
